minChunkViewDist.desc:: The minimum chunk view distance allowed to use. Default: 5, minimum 3, maximum 200

maxChunkViewDist.desc:: The maximum chunk view distance allowed to use. Set to the max a player could benefit from. Default: 15, minimum 1, maximum 200

meanAvgTickTime.desc:: The average tick time to stabilize the chunk view distance around. Setting it higher than 50ms is not advised, as after 50ms the TPS will go below 20. Default: 45ms, min: 10, max:100

viewDistanceUpdateRate.desc:: The update frequency of average server tick time checks to update view distances.(In seconds) Default: 30, min:1, max:1000

logMessages.desc:: Whether to output log messages for actions done. This can be helpful to balance the other settings nicely. Default = true

chunkunload.desc:: Enable slow chunk unloading(~1minute) after load, helps with mods hot-loading chunks frequently. Default: true
